sentences.sContent: Such quadrangle-shaped logos may fit all kinds of projects: from hotel logos to social initiatives and to real estate agencies.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such quadrangle-shaped logos may fit all kinds of projects: from hotel logos to social initiatives and to real estate agencies.
sentences.sCn: 这样的四边形logo可适用于各类项目：从旅馆logo到社会创意，再到房地产商。

sentences.sContent: Naturally our whole being was depressed as we stepped through its doorway into the narrow quadrangle--and playing truant became chronic with us.
sentences.sContent_eng: Naturally our whole being was depressed as we stepped through its doorway into the narrow quadrangle--and playing truant became chronic with us.
sentences.sCn: 很自然，当我们踏进校门进入那狭小的四方院子时，我们整个人都变得萎靡不振---逃学就成为我们的家常便饭。

sentences.sContent: Properly combined with other graphic elements, background, and color palette, quadrangle logos may become efficient identifications for businessand impressive addition to a logo designer’s portfolio.
sentences.sContent_eng: Properly combined with other graphic elements, background, and color palette, quadrangle logos may become efficient identifications for businessand impressive addition to a logo designer’s portfolio.
sentences.sCn: 适当结合其他图形元素、背景和配色，四边形logo或可成为高效的商业标识，亦可为logo设计师的作品集里添上印象深刻的一笔。

trans.tranOther: a square open area with buildings all around it, especially at a school or college
